verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to him in the <S%H436>plains<s%> of <S%H4471>Mamre:<s%> and he <S%H3427>sat<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H6607>door<s%> in the <S%H2527>heat<s%> of the <S%H3117>day;<s%>

And he <S%H5375>lift<s%> up his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and, <S%H2009>see,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H5324>stood<s%> by him: and when he <S%H7200>saw<s%> them, he <S%H7323>ran<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> them from the <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H6607>door,<s%> and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> himself toward the <S%H776>ground,<s%>

And <S%H559>said,<s%> My <S%H136>LORD,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight,<s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> not away, I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, from your <S%H5650>servant:<s%>

Let a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H4325>water,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, be <S%H3947>fetched,<s%> and <S%H7364>wash<s%> your <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and <S%H8172>rest<s%> yourselves <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H6086>tree:<s%>

And I will <S%H3947>fetch<s%> a <S%H6595>morsel<s%> of <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and <S%H5582>comfort<s%> you your <S%H3820>hearts;<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> that you shall <S%H5674>pass<s%> on: for <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> are you <S%H5674>come<s%> to your <S%H5650>servant.<s%> And they <S%H1696>said,<s%> <S%H3651>So<s%> <S%H6213>do,<s%> as you have <S%H1696>said.<s%>

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H4116>hastened<s%> into the <S%H168>tent<s%> to <S%H8283>Sarah,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Make <S%H4116>ready<s%> <S%H4116>quickly<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5429>measures<s%> of <S%H5560>fine<s%> <S%H7058>meal,<s%> <S%H5560><s%> <S%H3888>knead<s%> it, and <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H5692>cakes<s%> on the <S%H3820>hearth.<s%>

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H7323>ran<s%> to the <S%H1241>herd,<s%> and <S%H3947>fetched<s%> a <S%H1121>calf<s%> <S%H1241><s%> <S%H7390>tender<s%> and <S%H2896>good,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> it to a <S%H5288>young<s%> man; and he <S%H4116>hurried<s%> to <S%H6213>dress<s%> it.

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H2529>butter,<s%> and <S%H2461>milk,<s%> and the <S%H1121>calf<s%> <S%H1241><s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H6213>dressed,<s%> and <S%H5414>set<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> them; and he <S%H5975>stood<s%> by them <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H6086>tree,<s%> and they did <S%H398>eat.<s%>
And they <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H346>Where<s%> is <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> your <S%H802>wife?<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> in the <S%H168>tent.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H7725>certainly<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> to you according to the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H2416>life;<s%> and, <S%H2009>see,<s%> <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> your <S%H802>wife<s%> shall have a <S%H1121>son.<s%> And <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> it in the <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H6607>door,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> was <S%H310>behind<s%> him.

Now <S%H85>Abraham<s%> and <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> were <S%H2205>old<s%> and well <S%H935>stricken<s%> in <S%H3117>age;<s%> and it <S%H2308>ceased<s%> to be with <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> after the <S%H734>manner<s%> of <S%H802>women.<s%>

Therefore <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> <S%H6711>laughed<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> herself, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H310>After<s%> I am waxed <S%H1086>old<s%> shall I <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H5730>pleasure,<s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%> being <S%H2204>old<s%> also?

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> did <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> <S%H6711>laugh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Shall I of a <S%H552>surety<s%> <S%H3205>bear<s%> a child, <S%H589>which<s%> am <S%H2204>old?<s%>

Is any <S%H1697>thing<s%> too <S%H6381>hard<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%> At the time <S%H4150>appointed<s%> I will <S%H7725>return<s%> to you, according to the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H2416>life,<s%> and <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> shall have a <S%H1121>son.<s%>
Then <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> <S%H3584>denied,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> I <S%H6711>laughed<s%> not; for she was <S%H3372>afraid.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3808>No;<s%> but you did <S%H6711>laugh.<s%>

And the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H6965>rose<s%> up from <S%H8033>there,<s%> and <S%H8259>looked<s%> <S%H5921>toward<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H5467>Sodom:<s%> and <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> with them to <S%H7971>bring<s%> them on the <S%H7971>way.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Shall I <S%H3680>hide<s%> from <S%H85>Abraham<s%> that thing <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6213>do;<s%>

Seeing that <S%H85>Abraham<s%> shall surely <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H6099>mighty<s%> <S%H1471>nation,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall be <S%H1288>blessed<s%> in him?

For I <S%H3045>know<s%> him, that he will <S%H6680>command<s%> his <S%H1121>children<s%> and his <S%H1004>household<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him, and they shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H6666>justice<s%> and <S%H4941>judgment;<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> may <S%H935>bring<s%> on <S%H85>Abraham<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> of him.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> the <S%H2201>cry<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%> is <S%H7227>great,<s%> and <S%H3588>because<s%> their <S%H2403>sin<s%> is <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3513>grievous;<s%>

I will <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> whether they have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H3617>altogether<s%> according to the <S%H6818>cry<s%> of it, which is <S%H935>come<s%> to me; and <S%H518>if<s%> not, I will <S%H3045>know.<s%>

And the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H6437>turned<s%> their faces from <S%H8033>there,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> toward <S%H5467>Sodom:<s%> but <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> drew <S%H5066>near,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Will you <S%H637>also<s%> <S%H5595>destroy<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> with the <S%H7563>wicked?<s%>

<S%H194>Peradventure<s%> there be <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> the <S%H5892>city:<s%> will you <S%H637>also<s%> <S%H5595>destroy<s%> and not <S%H5375>spare<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> for the <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H6662>righteous<s%> that are <S%H7130>therein?<s%>

That be <S%H2486>far<s%> from you to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3651>after<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>manner,<s%> to <S%H4191>slay<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> with the <S%H7563>wicked:<s%> and that the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> should be as the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> that be <S%H2486>far<s%> from you: Shall not the <S%H8199>Judge<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H4941>right?<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> I <S%H4672>find<s%> in <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> then I will <S%H5375>spare<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> for their <S%H5668>sakes.<s%>

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> I have <S%H2974>taken<s%> on me to <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H136>LORD,<s%> <S%H595>which<s%> am but <S%H6083>dust<s%> and <S%H665>ashes:<s%>

<S%H194>Peradventure<s%> there shall <S%H2637>lack<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> of the <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H6662>righteous:<s%> will you <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> for lack of <S%H2568>five?<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> I <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H2568>five,<s%> I will not <S%H7843>destroy<s%> it.

And he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to him <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H3254>again,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H194>Peradventure<s%> there shall be <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> there. And he <S%H559>said,<s%> I will not <S%H6213>do<s%> it for <S%H705>forty's<s%> <S%H5668>sake.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4994>Oh<s%> let not the <S%H136>LORD<s%> be <S%H2734>angry,<s%> and I will <S%H1696>speak:<s%> <S%H194>Peradventure<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> shall <S%H7970>thirty<s%> be <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> I will not <S%H6213>do<s%> it, <S%H518>if<s%> I <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> I have <S%H2974>taken<s%> on me to <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H136>LORD:<s%> <S%H194>Peradventure<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> shall be <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> I will not <S%H7843>destroy<s%> it for <S%H6242>twenty's<s%> <S%H5668>sake.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4994>Oh<s%> let not the <S%H136>LORD<s%> be <S%H2734>angry,<s%> and I will <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H389>yet<s%> but <S%H6471>this<s%> <S%H6471>once:<s%> <S%H194>Peradventure<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> shall be <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> I will not <S%H7843>destroy<s%> it for <S%H6235>ten's<s%> <S%H5668>sake.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> his <S%H3212>way,<s%> as <S%H834>soon<s%> as he had <S%H3615>left<s%> <S%H1696>communing<s%> with <S%H85>Abraham:<s%> and <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to his <S%H4725>place.<s%>
